article_title: Freshman Concord congressman navigates path between conservatism, moderation
article_text: U.S. Rep. Richard Hudson admits he was ‘naive’ last fall to think he and other Republicans could pin down Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid and force Democrats to scale back Obamacare.

article_metadata.title: Freshman Concord congressman navigates path between conservatism, moderation | The Charlotte Observer
